synopsis.text: Natsume's first day at Yamabuki High School doesn't go as planned, but a chance encounter with Sae leads to an unexpected reunion. Meanwhile, the girls of Hidamari Apartments receive coupons for a new family restaurant in town, only to discover their landlady working there. In an attempt to cure her homesickness, Yuno decides to visit her family, while Miyako finds an old barbecue grill and invites the apartment residents to a small barbecue party. As the school year progresses, two new students, Nori and Nazuna, join the group at Hidamari Apartments, adding to the lively and heartwarming daily life of the students. This anime follows the everyday adventures and friendships of these girls, filled with laughter, tears, and unforgettable moments.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
